title: Dodge Police 18s
description: Escape from the police in this intense survival game! Dodge the police officers for 18 seconds to prove your skills. The longer you survive, the higher your score. How long can you evade the cops?
controls: Touch or click and drag your avatar to dodge the police officers. Avoid contact at all costs! Move quickly and strategically to survive for 18 seconds. The police move faster as time progresses.
author: LightGame Team
